text: The 1972–77 Nordic Football Championship was the 11th Nordic Football Championship. Four Nordic countries were in the tournament, Denmark, Finland, Norway and Sweden. Sweden ended up winning their 9th title. == Results == Team Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts Sweden 12 8 2 2 24 9 +15 18 Denmark 12 7 3 2 15 7 +8 17 Norway 12 2 3 7 12 19 –7 7 Finland 12 1 4 7 10 26 –16 6 == References == Category:Nordic Football Championship Category:1970s in Norway Category:1970s in Sweden Category:1970s in Denmark Category:1970s in Finland Category:1973 in European sport Category:1974 in European football Category:1975 in sports Category:1976 in European football Category:1977 in sports Category:1972 in European football Category:1975 in Europe Category:1977 in Europe
title: 1972–77 Nordic Football Championship
